name: Manicotti
ingredients: 1 3/4 cup (15 oz) ricotta cheese 1/2 t salt
1/2 cup grated Parmesean cheese 3 cups (30 oz jar) spaghetti sauce
40 minutes at 350. Remove foil. Bake 15 minutes longer.
steps: Cook past 6-­‐8 minutes. Drain and cool. Stir together cheeses and spices. Put into shells. Spread layer of
sauce on the bottom of a 9 x 13 inch pan. put in manicotti. Put rest of sauce on top. Cover with foil. Bake
